subject: Investing
title: Why Smart People Make Bad Investments
description: A 60-second lesson on Why Smart People Make Bad Investments.

hook.text: Isaac Newton lost a fortune in the South Sea Bubble. Even geniuses fall for market mania.

buildup.text: Intelligence doesn't protect against cognitive biases. In fact, confidence can make them worse.

discovery.text: Behavioral finance studies why humans consistently make irrational financial choices.

twist.text: The biases are hardwired. They kept our ancestors alive on the savanna but sabotage portfolios.

climax.text: Awareness is the first defense: once you name a bias, you can build guardrails against it.
